name: Star-Nosed Diopsid
languages: Deep Speech, Undercommon, telepathy 100' (300' w/its own kind)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Stinger attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 26 (4d10+4) piercing damage. If Humanoid succumbs to diopsid's venom (DC 16 Con negates see Mutagenic Venom).

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 17 (3d8+4) bludgeoning damage. Target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it is an up to Large creature and diopsid doesn't have 2 grappled.

actions.name: Share Senses
actions.desc: While within 300' of an envenomed Humanoid diopsid sees through target's eyes and hears what target hears until start of its next turn gaining benefits of any special senses target has. On subsequent turns diopsid can use a bonus action to extend duration of this effect until start of its next turn.

actions.name: Control Envenomed (3/Day)
actions.desc: While within 300' of an envenomed Humanoid diopsid can telepathically suggest course of activity to it. Humanoid must make DC 16 Wis save or pursue the activity suggested to it. Success: Humanoid takes 11 (2d10) psychic and has disadvantage next time it makes this save. Works like suggestion spell and Humanoid unaware of diopsid's influence.

special_abilities.name: Mutagenic Venom
special_abilities.desc: Produces potent poison that envenoms Humanoid victim and slowly transforms it into new diopsid. While envenomed treats all diopsid as if charmed by them. Every 24 hrs that elapse victim : DC 16 Con save reducing hp max by 5 (2d4) on failure. Reduction lasts until creature finishes long rest after venom removed. Creature dies if this reduces hp max to 0. Humanoid that dies from this horrifically transformed becoming new diopsid and losing all memory of its former life. Poison remains within creature's body until removed by greater restoration or similar.
